content: All shared links in this room will become active, and its contents will be available to everyone with the link. Do you want to restore the room?

comment.text: This translation key is used for a confirmation message when restoring all shared links in a room. It asks if the user wants to restore the room, appearing as a dialog prompt. The purpose of this text is to confirm the action with the user before making changes.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "shared links" is translated as "xarici keçidlər". While 'xarici' can mean external, in this context 'shared links' implies links distributed to others, not necessarily links from outside the room. A more accurate translation might be something like 'paylaşılan keçidlər' (shared links).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'paylaşılan keçidlər' instead of 'xarici keçidlər' to more accurately reflect the meaning of 'shared links'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term "shared links" is translated as "външни линкове". While "външни" can mean 'external', in this context, 'shared links' refers to links shared within a room, not links from outside the room.  'Споделени линкове' would be a more accurate translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Всички споделени линкове в тази стая ще станат активни...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'everyone with the link' is translated as 'všem, kteří na ni odkazují'. While technically correct, it's a bit awkward. A more natural translation would convey that anyone *possessing* the link gains access, not just those who 'link to it'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Všechny externí odkazy v této místnosti se stanou aktivními a její obsah bude dostupný všem, kteří mají odkaz. Chcete místnost obnovit?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'externen Links'. While 'externen' can imply external, 'shared' suggests links distributed among users within a system, which 'externen' doesn't fully convey. A better translation might be 'gemeinsamen Links' or 'geteilteten Links'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'gemeinsamen Links' or 'geteilteten Links' for a more accurate translation of 'shared links'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'shared links' is translated as 'εξωτερικοί σύνδεσμοι'. While technically correct, 'κοινόι σύνδεσμοι' would be a more natural and accurate translation in this context, as it emphasizes that the links are shared within the room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Όλοι οι κοινόι σύνδεσμοι σε αυτό το δωμάτιο θα γίνουν ενεργοί...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'restore the room' is translated as 'γίνει επαναφορά δωματίου'. While understandable, a more idiomatic translation would be 'να επαναφέρεις το δωμάτιο'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Θέλετε να επαναφέρεις το δωμάτιο;

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'shared links' is translated as 'enlaces externos'. While 'externos' can mean external, in this context 'compartidos' (shared) would be more accurate to convey the intended meaning of links shared within the room’s collaborative environment.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Todos los enlaces compartidos de esta sala se activarán...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'All shared links' is translated as 'Kaikki ulkoiset linkit'. While 'ulkoiset' (external) isn't inherently wrong, it might be too specific. The original implies shared links among users within the system, not necessarily external links.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more general translation like 'Kaikki jaetut linkit' or 'Kaikki linkit'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'its contents' is translated as 'sen sisältö'. While grammatically correct, it's a bit clunky. 'Sen sisältö' literally means 'its content.' A more natural phrasing could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'huoneen sisältö' or 'huoneeseen kuuluva sisältö' for a more fluent phrasing.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'ja' (and) connects two clauses that could potentially be separated for better readability.  The flow isn't as smooth as it could be.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to avoid consecutive 'ja' connections. For example, 'Kaikki jaetut linkit tulevat aktiivisiksi. Huoneen sisältö on saatavilla kaikille linkin kautta.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'shared links' is translated as 'liens externes'. While 'externes' can be accurate in some contexts, in this case, 'partagés' would be a more precise and natural translation to convey the meaning of links shared within the room's functionality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tous les liens partagés de cette salle deviendront actifs...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase " արտաքին հղումները" (artakin hghumner) translates to "external links". While technically correct, "shared links" implies a different meaning. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of links shared within a collaborative space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using a phrase like “մատուցված հղումները” (matuts'vad hghumner) which translates to 'distributed links' or 'provided links', or a more descriptive phrase to clearly indicate shared links.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase “ովքեր ունեն հղումը” (ovqer unenn hghum) literally translates to “who have the link.” A more natural phrasing would imply those with access to the link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace “ովքեր ունեն հղումը” with “այնքանով մոտենալու հնարավորությունը ունեցողների” (aynqanov motenalu hnaravorut'yun uni cogner) which translates to 'those who have the possibility of approaching' or a similar construct to improve readability and natural flow.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "shared links" is translated as "link esterni". While "esterni" (external) isn't inherently wrong, "shared links" implies links distributed among users, not necessarily originating from outside the room. A more accurate translation would better convey the original meaning, perhaps using "link condivisi".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating "shared links" as "link condivisi".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "shared links" is translated as "外部リンク" (external links). While technically correct, it doesn't fully convey the intended meaning of links shared within the room, accessible to those with the link. A more accurate translation might be something that implies links shared within the room’s context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "このルーム内で共有されているリンク" (Links shared within this room) to better reflect the original meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The question mark at the end of the question 'このルームを復元しますか？' is slightly less natural than other options. While acceptable, it is slightly more direct and less conversational than might be preferred in UI text.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a slightly softened phrasing like 'このルームを復元しますか？' or even 'このルームを復元してもよろしいですか？' (Would you like to restore this room?)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "외부 링크" (external links) isn't the most natural way to describe "shared links" in this context. While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal and less user-friendly.  "공유 링크" (shared links) would be more common and easily understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 방의 모든 공유 링크가 활성화되고 링크를 가진 모든 사람이 해당 콘텐츠를 사용할 수 있게 됩니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "become active" is not accurately translated. "ລິ້ງທີ່ແບ່ງປັນທັງໝົດຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງນີ້ຈະກາຍເປັນການເຄື່ອນໄຫວ" literally translates to 'All shared links in this room will become movement'. It should convey the meaning of the links becoming functional or working.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງທີ່ແບ່ງປັນທັງໝົດຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງນີ້ຈະສາມາດນໍາໃຊ້ໄດ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "available to everyone" could be improved for clarity and flow. The current translation 'ມີໃຫ້ທຸກຄົນທີ່ມີລິ້ງ' is slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສາມາດເຂົ້າເບິ່ງໄດ້ສໍາລັບຜູ້ທີ່ມີລິ້ງທັງຫມົດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the Lao translation lacks the formality expected in a confirmation prompt. The English uses a question mark; the Lao translation should consistently use one as well.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງທີ່ແບ່ງປັນທັງໝົດຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງນີ້ຈະສາມາດນໍາໃຊ້ໄດ້, ແລະເນື້ອຫາຂອງມັນຈະສາມາດເຂົ້າເບິ່ງໄດ້ສໍາລັບຜູ້ທີ່ມີລິ້ງທັງຫມົດ? ທ່ານຕ້ອງການຟື້ນຟູຫ້ອງບໍ?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'ārējās saites' which means 'external links'. While technically correct, 'shared links' implies links meant for sharing with others, which is a more precise meaning in this context. 'Kopīgās saites' would be a more accurate translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ārējās saites' with 'kopīgās saites'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'externe links'. While 'externe' (external) isn't inherently wrong, 'shared links' implies links distributed amongst a group, not just links from outside the system. The nuance is lost.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'gedeelde links' for a more accurate translation of 'shared links'. Alternatively, rephrase the Dutch to be more descriptive of the meaning if 'gedeelde' isn't suitable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'contents' is translated as 'materiaal'. While 'materiaal' can refer to content, it's a more general term. 'Inhoud' would be a more direct and accurate translation of 'contents' in this context, emphasizing the specific data within the room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'materiaal' with 'inhoud' for a more accurate representation of 'contents'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'restore the room' is translated as 'de kamer herstellen'. While grammatically correct, 'herstellen' implies a return to a previous state, whereas the English phrasing sounds more like reactivation or making accessible.  'Reactiveren de kamer' or 'de kamer beschikbaar maken' might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Reactiveren de kamer' or 'de kamer beschikbaar maken' for a more nuanced translation of 'restore the room'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'linki zewnętrzne'. While 'zewnętrzne' (external) isn't inherently wrong, 'shared links' implies links shared *within* a group, not necessarily external to the platform.  A more accurate translation might be 'wspólne linki'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wspólne linki

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'available to everyone with the link' is translated as 'dostępna dla wszystkich użytkowników posiadających link'. While understandable, it's slightly verbose. A more concise and natural translation would be 'dostępna dla wszystkich z linkiem'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: dostępna dla wszystkich z linkiem

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'links externos'. While 'externos' can mean external, in this context, 'compartilhados' (shared) would be more accurate to convey the original meaning, as the links are being shared within the room's context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Todos os links compartilhados desta sala ficarão ativos...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'links externos'. While 'externos' isn't *wrong*, 'compartilhados' would be a more accurate translation of 'shared' in this context, emphasizing the collaborative aspect of the room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Todos os links compartilhados desta sala ficarão ativos...

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'link-urile externe'. While 'externe' (external) can sometimes be appropriate, 'shared' implies that the links are distributed amongst users, not necessarily originating from an external source. A more accurate translation would be something like 'link-urile impartasite'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: link-urile impartasite

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'tot conținutul vor fi disponibil' contains a subject-verb agreement error. 'Conținutul' is singular, so the verb should be 'va fi', not 'vor fi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tot conținutul va fi disponibil

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'to everyone with the link' is awkwardly translated as 'tuturor pe link-ul'.  A more natural Romanian phrasing would be 'tuturor celor care au link-ul' or 'tuturor cu link-ul'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: tuturor celor care au link-ul

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'restore the room' is not accurately translated. 'ප්‍රත්‍යර්පණයට' (pratyarpanayaṭa) implies a more formal or complete recovery than a simple restoration. A better translation would focus on re-enabling or reactivating the room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කාමරය නැවත සක්‍රීය කිරීමට අවශ්යද?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence 'සබැඳිය සතු සැමට අන්තර්ගත වෙත ප්‍රවේශ වීමට හැකිය' is grammatically awkward. The phrase 'අන්තර්ගත වෙත ප්‍රවේශ වීමට' is not the most natural way to express 'access to the contents'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සබැඳිය ඇති සියල්ලන්ටම අන්තර්ගතයට ප්‍රවේශ විය හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, the punctuation could be improved for readability. A full stop (.) at the end of the entire translation would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙම කාමරය සඳහා වන සියලුම බෙදාගත් සබැඳි සක්‍රිය වනු ඇත. සබැඳිය ඇති සියල්ලන්ටම අන්තර්ගතයට ප්‍රවේශ විය හැකිය. ඔබට කාමරය නැවත සක්‍රීය කිරීමට අවශ්යද?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'externé odkazy'. While 'externé odkazy' (external links) isn't *wrong*, 'shared links' implies links distributed amongst users within a system, not necessarily links originating from outside the system. A more accurate translation might be 'spoločné odkazy' or 'sdíľané odkazy'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'spoločné odkazy' or 'sdíľané odkazy' instead of 'externé odkazy'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "shared links" is translated as "zunanje povezave". While technically correct, "zunanje povezave" (external links) isn't the best fit. "Shared links" implies links intended for sharing, and a more accurate translation would be something along the lines of "deljene povezave" or "povezave za deljenje".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating "shared links" as "deljene povezave" or "povezave za deljenje".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ц́е' appears multiple times. It seems like a typo. It should likely be 'ће'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ће

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'shared links' is translated as 'liên kết bên ngoài'. While 'bên ngoài' (external) isn't *wrong*, it's not the most accurate. 'shared links' implies links meant for sharing with others, not necessarily external to a specific platform. A more accurate translation would capture this sharing aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'liên kết chia sẻ' or 'liên kết chung' instead of 'liên kết bên ngoài'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'available to everyone' is translated as 'khả dụng cho tất cả mọi người'. While grammatically correct, it sounds slightly formal and less natural.  A more conversational equivalent is often preferred in UI/UX translations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ai có liên kết' or 'bất kỳ ai có liên kết' instead of 'khả dụng cho tất cả mọi người'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The question mark at the end of the Vietnamese sentence 'Bạn có muốn khôi phục phòng không?' is slightly less common in UI copy. While not incorrect, removing it can result in a cleaner, more modern feel, common in localized UIs.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the question mark at the end: 'Bạn có muốn khôi phục phòng?'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'shared links' is translated as '外部链接' (external links). While technically correct, 'shared links' implies links distributed among users, not just links pointing outward. A more accurate translation might be '共享链接' to emphasize the sharing aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 共享链接

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'become active' is translated as '变为活动状态'. While understandable, '激活' (jihuó) would be a more common and natural way to express the same meaning in Chinese within a technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 激活
